Cherrycake\Modules\Security::removeAutoBannedIp

removeAutoBannedIp

Deletes the given Ip to the automatically banned Ips list. If the Ip is already on the list, the TTL is updated

    Signature

    public function removeAutoBannedIp([boolean $ip = false] )

    Parameters

    $ip — boolean
    Ip to unban. The current client's Ip is used if not specified
